Title: Requires all bus companies to post on their websites or at the places they sell tickets, certain information
Summary: Requires all bus companies to post on their internet websites or at the places they sell tickets, certain information maintained by the federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration.
LawCode: Add ยง509-nn, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring motor carriers of passengers to post, for public viewing, certain information on their websites
